message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be fair to propose a price of $14,000 for this exceptional item.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to pay $12,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To better align with your budget, we're proposing a revised price of $13,500 for the item.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price. I'm still a bit hesitant at $13,500. How about we split the difference and go with $13,000? This would be a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident I can make good use of the product.
